description: This Java source file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application. It provides centralized handling of various exceptions by mapping them to appropriate HTTP responses and logging errors.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring REST controller advice that handles various exceptions globally across the application.

methods.name: notFound
methods.description: Handles NoSuchElementException, returning a 404 NOT_FOUND response.

methods.name: validation
methods.description: Handles validation exceptions, returning a 400 BAD_REQUEST response with details.

methods.name: badRequest
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException, returning a 400 BAD_REQUEST response.

methods.name: conflict
methods.description: Handles IllegalStateException, returning a 409 CONFLICT response.

methods.name: generic
methods.description: Handles general exceptions, returning a 500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR response.

methods.name: wsErrors
methods.description: Handles WebSocket-related errors and logs warnings.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs a ResponseEntity with an ErrorBody, logs the error details, and returns the response.
